sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from "react";
import {FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText, Row, Col} from "reactstrap";
import {AvForm, AvField, AvInput} from "availity-reactstrap-validation";
import faceContext from "../../context/face/faceContext";

const AddUser = (props) => {
	const facesContext = useContext(faceContext);
	const {agregarProyecto} = facesContext;

	/*Creacion del objeto usuario */
	const [usuario, guardarUsuario] = useState({
		name: "",
		surname: "",
		age: "",
		sex: "",

		email: "",
		password: "",
	});

	const onSubmitProyecto = (e) => {
		e.preventDefault();
	};

	return (
		<React.Fragment>
			<AvForm
				className="needs-validation mt-3"
				onValidSubmit={onSubmitProyecto}>
				<Row>
					<Col md="6">
						<AvField
							name="Nombre"
							label="Nombre"
							errorMessage="Introduce un nombre válido"
							className="form-control"
							validate={{required: {value: true}}}
						/>
					</Col>
					<Col md="6">
						<AvField
							name="surname"
							label="Apellido"
							errorMessage="Introduce un apellido válido"
							className="form-control"
							validate={{required: {value: true}}}
						/>
					</Col>
				</Row>

				<FormGroup>
					<AvField
						name="Edad"
						label="Edad"
						type="text"
						validate={{number: true}}
						errorMessage="Introduce una edad válida"
						className="form-control"
						required
					/>
				</FormGroup>
				<Label for="gender">Sexo</Label>
				<FormGroup check>
					<Label check>
						<Input type="radio" name="gender" defaultChecked /> Masculino
					</Label>
				</FormGroup>
				<FormGroup check>
					<Label check>
						<Input type="radio" name="gender" /> Femenino
					</Label>
				</FormGroup>
				<FormGroup>
					<Label for="exampleSelect">Nivel de confianza</Label>
					<AvField
						type="select"
						name="confidenceLevels"
						helpMessage="Escoge el nivel de confianza al que pertenece el usuario">
						<option>1</option>
						<option>2</option>
						<option>3</option>
						<option>4</option>
						<option>5</option>
					</AvField>
				</FormGroup>
				<FormGroup className="mt-3">
					<FormGroup>
						<Label for="exampleFile">Foto del rostro</Label>
						<Input type="file" name="file" id="exampleFile" className="" />
						<FormText color="muted">Formatos permitidos: .jpg y .png</FormText>
					</FormGroup>
				</FormGroup>
			</AvForm>
		</React.Fragment>
	);
};

export default AddUser;
